content.text: Bruno Mars, whose real name is Peter Gene Hernandez, was born in Honolulu, Hawaii.

content.text: I'm not gonna preach that I'm a role model. I'm a fucking musician! But I've learned people are watching, so don't do nothing stupid.

content.sourceTitle: What religion does Bruno Mars practice?
content.text: Mars, as is indicated by his real last name, is of Hispanic descent and so probably has some Catholic in his family. The various question and answer sites on the Internet seem to agree that Mars is some kind of Christian.
So we're going to go out on a limb and say he's, at least traditionally, a Catholic.
The only clue to Mars' actual internal spirituality would be a line out of his song, "It Will Rain," where he sings:

content.sourceTitle: Jennifer Hudson And Bruno Mars Perform For Rainforest Fund
content.text: There isn't much for politics with Mr. Mars either. The best I could find was that he performed at a rainforest benefit concert at New York's Carnegie Hall.
And Bill Clinton was there, too. So Mars is likely a liberal Democrat.
